aviationFactsList.fact: The Lockheed SR-71 Blackbird flew from L.A. to Washington D.C. in just 64 minutes, setting a world record
Charles Lindbergh was the first pilot to solo a nonstop transatlantic flight
Some large private jets have a maximum range of nearly 8,000 nautical miles
